displayName.text: Lexington Ave Pharmacy (MOVED TO 2021 LEXINGTON AVE 123/LEXINGTON)

formattedAddress: 2021 Lexington Avenue #3 123 RD ST, Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10035, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Lexington Ave Pharmacy (MOVED TO 2021 LEXINGTON AVE 123/LEXINGTON)
Lexington Ave Pharmacy (MOVED TO 2021 LEXINGTON AVE 123/LEXINGTON)

adrFormatAddress: 2021 Lexington Avenue #3 123 RD ST, Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10035-1732, USA

originalText.text:
The staff are so extremely friendly and helpful, they remember me by name, after just a few visits. I’ve always been in and out in less than 5 minutes, the ladies at the counter are so sweet, it’s unreal!
For the location, it’s a rarity to experience such upbeat and caring people who truly care about patients. Not just for the location, I haven’t experienced such great service in all of Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens and especially anywhere in Long Island.
Lexington Ave Pharmacy is a diamond in the rough.
**** The street is filled with beggars and addicts, they don’t wear masks out there so be careful on your way in.****

originalText.text: This place opens and closes when it wants. So make sure you call and ask them if they will be open because even then they will still close messing your schedule up. They pass the phone around like phone tag if there is an issue and in the end still wont resolve it. My first impression was good. Second time my medication was lost for two weeks. Third time, I am done and after being talked to the way I was will be taking this to BBB and anyone else.

originalText.text: They claim to be open till 6pm but a few times I rush there after work and get there by 5:40pm THEY ARE CLOSED….not dependable I gotta tell my doctor to stop sending my meds there.

text.text: They claim to be open till 6pm but a few times I rush there after work and get there by 5:40pm THEY ARE CLOSED….not dependable I gotta tell my doctor to stop sending my meds there.

originalText.text: I have been going to that pharmacy for like 4 yrs when the pharmacist name was Larry he use to work there he was so nice and now i just deal with one of the girls that used to help when he was around they are very friendly if there is any problem eith your insurance they will make the calls nessacery to get the matter resolved they will do anything in there hands to help they are suppose to charge people for deducteble for scripts and they will not charge you a penny try that in duane read or cvs you will walk out without uour nedication all im saying give them a chance to help you wont regret the experience.....

originalText.text: I have been going here for my prescriptions for 2 years. Always have them on time
